page.title: 18GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: The under sevens at school like playing a wide variety of games. Popular games are rounders , playing on the climbing frame and football. There are a couple of strange games called Batman and circles. The over sevens under twelves like playing a wide variety of games at home too.Riding bikes is by far the most popular thing to do. Next is Lego. The strangest game is called Tourcher.A girl called Ruth plays with her dog called Sheba. In school the older children like playing rounders,hit,chains and stuck in the mud.Rounders is the favourite game to play at play time,next is hit and then football. by NEIL SARGENT and PETER LORENZI.
